steps.1: Cook-Cook for 2 minutes or until the zoodles are done
steps.4: Top-Top with more parmesan if desired
steps.5: Heat-Heat a large pan on medium heat
steps.8: Add-Add 1 large minced garlic cloves to the pan
steps.11: Cook-Cook garlic until fragrant (about 1 minutes). Be careful not to burn garlic
steps.12: Spiralize-Spiralize 1 medium zucchini into thin noodles using a spiralizer
